basics.name: Alex C. Developer
basics.label: Mid-Level Fullstack Developer | AI Enthusiast
basics.summary: Dynamic and results-oriented Mid-Level Fullstack Developer with 5+ years of experience in designing, developing, and deploying web applications using .NET and modern JavaScript frameworks. Proven ability to integrate AI solutions to enhance application capabilities. Expertise in Angular, React, and Material Design, with a strong commitment to creating intuitive and efficient user experiences.

work.name: Innovatech Solutions Inc.
work.summary: Developed and maintained scalable web applications using .NET Core, Angular, and React. Key member in a team that integrated a recommendation engine (AI) into the company's flagship product, improving user engagement by 20%.
highlights: Led the front-end development for a major client project using Angular and Material Design.
Collaborated on the design and implementation of RESTful APIs with .NET Web API.
Contributed to the development of an AI-powered chatbot for customer service.

work.name: Tech Forward Ltd.
work.summary: Contributed to the full software development lifecycle of various client projects, utilizing C#, ASP.NET MVC, and React. Gained foundational experience in cloud services and CI/CD pipelines.
highlights: Developed responsive user interfaces with React and Bootstrap.
Worked on database design and implementation using SQL Server.
Participated in early-stage AI project discussions, focusing on data preprocessing for machine learning models.

volunteer.summary: Mentoring junior developers and students interested in software development and AI.
highlights: Hosted workshops on Introduction to Web Development.
Provided guidance on career development in tech.

references.name: Dr. Emily Carter, Former Manager at Tech Forward Ltd.

projects.name: AI-Powered Customer Feedback Analyzer
projects.description: Developed a web application that uses Natural Language Processing (NLP) to analyze customer feedback from various sources. The system categorizes feedback sentiment and identifies key topics, providing actionable insights for product improvement. Built with a .NET backend, React frontend, and integrated with a third-party NLP API.
highlights: Designed an intuitive dashboard for visualizing feedback trends

projects.name: E-commerce Platform with Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Led the development of a module for an e-commerce platform that provides personalized product recommendations. Utilized collaborative filtering techniques and integrated with the existing .NET-based platform. Frontend components were built with Angular.
highlights: Increased average order value by 10% in A/B testing
